name: Herobrine Craft 3
description:
Continuation of the series Herobrine Craft, you woke up in the Minecraft Universe in a junkyard in the woods, you are in an abandoned city, you are hunted by the Herobrine ghost, you need to find 15 diamonds, then you need to find the Herobrine Shrine and light it up.

During the game you will find Lucky Blocks, they can fall out of them useful things and bad things, here plays luck.

The game supports singleplayer and multiplayer up to 4 players - for multiplayer to work, players must have Steam installed and running.

Discord Server

Controls:

  • WASD - Walk
    Mouse - Move Camera
    Left Mouse - Attack
    Space Bar - Jump
    Left Shift - Sprint
    Tab - Change Skin
    E - Interact
    F - Toggle Flashlight
    1 - Switch to Sword
    2 - Switch to Bow
    3 - Hands
    X - Thirdperson
